description: Charles Cover, 66, is jailed after his original sentence is increased following public outcry.
title: Manx paedophile who attacked girl has sentence increased
title_page: Manx paedophile who attacked girl has sentence increased - BBC News
maintext: Defence advocate Ian Kermode said the previous sentence was appropriate and had "not been taken lightly" and that Cover had suffered "considerable anguish" due to the appeal.
